first_para: Charlotte Ann Leslie (born 11 August 1978 in Liverpool) is a British Conservative Party politician. She has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for the Bristol North West constituency since her election on 6 May 2010.

full.extract:
Charlotte Ann Leslie (born 11 August 1978 in Liverpool) is a British Conservative Party politician. She has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for the Bristol North West constituency since her election on 6 May 2010.
In 2013, she was named "Backbencher of the Year" by The Spectator magazine, in recognition of her work on accountability and patient safety in the NHS.
full.title: Charlotte Leslie
